thread.title: BeatsX Review: If Apple’s AirPods Aren’t Your Thing
thread.title_full: BeatsX Review: If Apple’s AirPods Aren’t Your Thing - WSJ

author: Nathan Olivarez-Giles
title: BeatsX Review: If Apple’s AirPods Aren’t Your Thing
text:
The BeatsX earphones are the latest attempt by Apple Inc. to nudge us into a wire-free future. They’re also the most convincing, thanks to a smart design that feels just as at home in the gym as it does at the office.

Last year, Apple dropped the headphone jack from the iPhone 7 and introduced the revolutionary (but easily lost) AirPods. Now, the $150 BeatsX come with the best part of the AirPods inside: Apple’s W1 chip for...
